Source.name: EBS Sensor: FIN AP Prepayment apply or unapply Event not getting Accounted - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: FIN AP Prepayment apply or unapply Event not getting Accounted - Weekly
Source.Description: If all payments for a Prepayment Invoice are Voided then the Prepayment Apply or Unapply events corresponding to the Prepay Invoice do not get accounted.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_FIN_AP_PREPAYMENT_EVENT_NOTGETTINGACCOUNTED' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'invoice_id:' || s.invoice_id key_data FROM (SELECT /*+ ordered use_nl(aid ppd) no_merge(iview) */ ai.invoice_id invoice_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT invoice_id FROM apps.ap_invoice_distributions_all WHERE accounting_date BETWEEN ( trunc(sysdate) - 7 ) AND ( trunc(sysdate) + 3 ) ) invs, apps.ap_invoices_all ai, apps.ap_invoice_lines_all ail, apps.ap_invoice_distributions_all aid, apps.ap_invoice_distributions_all ppd, apps.ap_invoices_all ai_prepay, apps.xla_events xe WHERE xe.application_id = 200 AND xe.event_id = aid.accounting_event_id AND aid.invoice_line_number = ail.line_number AND aid.invoice_id = ail.invoice_id AND ail.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id AND aid.prepay_distribution_id = ppd.invoice_distribution_id AND ppd.invoice_id = ai_prepay.invoice_id AND aid.posted_flag <> 'Y' AND xe.event_status_code <> 'P' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM apps.ap_invoice_payments_all aip WHERE aip.invoice_id = ai_prepay.invoice_id AND nvl(aip.reversal_flag, 'N') <> 'Y' ) AND ai.invoice_id = invs.invoice_id AND ROWNUM < 11 ORDER BY invoice_id) s
